title: Ep 320: Rick Glassman Goes Full Moon Manic
itunes:title: Ep 320: Rick Glassman Goes Full Moon Manic
description:
**Warning** It's our most seizure-inducing episode yet. Bobby is the boss, he really is the boss. Rick takes umbrage with 'it's 5 O'Clock Somewhere'. Khalyla is the sit-down-to-pee coach. We talk Jim Baker's apocalypse food, a Japanese yam, trade Jewish and Korean fables, and give the "loudest animal in the sea" punchline. Listen to TigerBelly Singing Competition winner Brandon Ross at the end of the episode.

Recorded: 10/08/21

More Rick Glassman: 

Take Your Shoes Off Podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/take-your-shoes-off-w-rick-glassman/id1457648702

Official Website: https://www.rickglassman.com
